Legacy Document

Important: The information in this document is obsolete and should not be used for new development.

Inside Macintosh: Advanced Color Imaging Reference /
Chapter 3 - ColorSync Manager Reference for Applications and Device Drivers / ColorSync Manager Functions

Working With Profiles and Profile Identifiers in Pictures

Your application uses the QuickDraw PicComment function, described in Inside Macintosh: Imaging With QuickDraw, to specify picture comments for embedding a profile or a profile identifier in a picture. The ColorSync Manager provides the NCMUseProfileComment function for embedding profiles and profile identifiers, and the NCMDrawMatchedPicture function for proper color matching when drawing pictures with embedded profiles.
